title: appA un pugazhai
sahitya:
appA un pugazhai nAn eppOdum anbuDan ceppiDum varam taruvAi


anupallavi

  cappaLa caLavenrE tarkkamitt-alaiyAmal saha mAyA jAlattAl sukha niSTai kalaiyAmal


caraNam    samaya vAda ulagir-sama nilai kUDumO sandaik-kUccalukku saraLiyum pADumO
tama rajap-puyalinri amaidi uLLaDangi nAn sAmba sadAshiva Om hari haravenrE
